LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_BattleBanner.label: battle banner
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_BattleBanner.description: A battle banner. Gives the wearer a fighting spirit and confidence.
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_MedicBag.label: medic bag
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_MedicBag.description: A bag with everything needed to provide medical treatment.
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_Quiver.label: quiver
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_ToolBelt.label: tool belt
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_ToolBelt.description: A simple tool belt with everything needed to nail a couple of planks or fix electrical appliances.
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_AmmoPack.label: ammo pack
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_ExplosiveBelt.label: explosive belt
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_RangedShieldBelt.label: ranged shield belt
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_RangedShieldBelt.descriptio: A projectile-repulsion device. It will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, but does nothing against melee attacks or heat. It doesn't prevent the wearer from firing out, and shuts down instantly if hit by EMP.
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_RessurectorBelt.label: ressurector belt
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_RessurectorBelt.description: A belt containing a dose of resurrector serum. Injects the serum immediately after death.
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_MiniTurretPack.label: mini-turret pack
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_MiniTurretPack.description: A small pack of ammunition and components that control a shoulder mounted mini-turret.
LanguageData.VAEA_Apparel_MiniTurretPack.comps.0.verb: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a shoulder.
